product_name: Bumble and bumbleThickening Blow-Dry Prep Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingBumble and bumble's Thickening blow-Dry Prep Spray is a lightweight thickening pre-styling volume spray that boosts hair thickness before you blow-dry to help you achieve your lushest, voluminous blowout.
details: DetailsBenefitsThickening pre-stylerVolumeIdeal for fine to medium hair types looking for voluminous blowout.Safe for color-treated hair, dry hair, or damaged hair from heat, chemicals or physical styling.Mist hair spray on before you blow dry to help increase hair thickness and create a lush, high volume look.An ideal volumizing hair product for fine-to-medium hair types, and anyone concerned with thinning hair.Key IngredientsCopolymer: helps provide light-to-medium holdPolyquaternium-11 and UP/VA Copolymer: provide light hold and controlFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesMineral OilFormaldehydeItem 2516144How To UseBefore you begin your hair styling routine, mist volume spray onto damp hair. Then follow with your blow dry and additional styling.From the Pros: For targeted hair thickening before you blow-dry, spray liberally wherever you want your look to be extra lush - Bumble's Pros love targeting the roots.Bumble's Pros say it's their "must-have" on every styling station. For targeted thickness, spray liberally wherever you want your blow dry to be extra lush - Bumble's Pros love targeting the roots.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Alcohol Denat., Isopropanol, Vp/Va Copolymer, Polyquaternium-11, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Honey, PEG-75 Lanolin, Polysorbate 80, Fragrance (Parfum), Eugenol, Limonene. Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Before you begin your hair styling routine, mist volume spray onto damp hair. Then follow with your blow dry and additional styling.From the Pros: For targeted hair thickening before you blow-dry, spray liberally wherever you want your look to be extra lush - Bumble's Pros love targeting the roots.Bumble's Pros say it's their "must-have" on every styling station. For targeted thickness, spray liberally wherever you want your blow dry to be extra lush - Bumble's Pros love targeting the roots.
ingredients: Limonene. Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Smells like hairspray. Dries your hair out.
reviews.comments: Doesn't thicken my hair. Wasted money.

reviews.headline: Great hair product
reviews.comments: I really like this product. I have been using it for years and am so glad that it comes in handy travel size. It's amazing and I really love it.

reviews.headline: I love the product!
reviews.comments: If you have fine hair and want some fullness to it, then this is what you need. Love the scent and is not heavy on your hair.

reviews.headline: Amazing product!
reviews.comments: This product is excellent! It gives instant lift to my hair. I have tried many products that my hairstylist sold me and they didn't compare to this product!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: This is the best for creating volume for fine hair.

reviews.headline: So disappointing
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this but it was just such a letdown. This product made my hair feel really greasy and not at all touchable. I returned this after one use.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: I have fine hair and Bumble and Bumble Thickening Blow-Dry Prep Spray really gives it volume and texture. My hair dresser used it on my hair and I had to have it. Love it!

reviews.headline: Different formula?
reviews.comments: I used to love this spray but my last bottle smells strongly of alcohol and it makes my hair static-y all day.  Won't purchase again.

reviews.headline: Love it!  I will definitely buy it again!
reviews.comments: Great Product üëç

reviews.headline: Exactly what I needed
reviews.comments: Gives my fine hair texture and volume

reviews.headline: Excellent Volumizer! I give it an A+!
reviews.comments: I have tried numerous volumizers throughout the years and also after Avon quit making my favorite one from MARK. I have a head of thick, heavy hair and this gives me nice lift and hold throughout the day! Love it!

reviews.headline: Returned it
reviews.comments: Made my hair feel dirty. Didn't make a difference when I blow dried it.

reviews.headline: Fantastic healthy thickening.
reviews.comments: I have tried several alternate choices.  This is measureably far better then other options.It's LIGHT yet totally lifts my hair. It's healthy.. i can  go a couple of days without shampooing, still lifting my hair. West Bend & My Stylist Mandi rock.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: I got this as my birthday gift and liked it enough to order the full size. It does a great job of detangling and I like how my super fine hair feels after using it. It does have an odd smell - like cherry throat spray - but it doesn't linger.

reviews.headline: Smells SO BAD
reviews.comments: I dont even know if this worked on my hair but the smell is unbearable. I have never in my life stopped using something because of the smell. It makes me light headed and nauseous. Pure alchohol. I read in another review the second ingredient is alchohol, so this is not good for your hair.

reviews.headline: this has been great for my coily hair
reviews.comments: I got this product for free and it is great. I have thin, fine, coily, Afro-American hair. I was nervous using B&B since it didn't seemed catered towards coily hair. But after using this product one time, I will be purchasing the full size. It made my hair bigger, fuller and more luscious. I didn't feel like my hair was paper thin but more like a layer of felt. I loved the way my hair came out after my at home silk press and this product will be a staple on my straightening routine.

reviews.headline: alcohol
reviews.comments: Would never purchase again. has a strong alcohol smell and made my hair dry and brittle. hard to even run a comb through.

reviews.headline: Better volumizers out there
reviews.comments: I didn't care for this at all.  Has a heavy alcohol smell and seemed to being drying.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I have baby fine hair and I absolutely love this product

reviews.headline: Lives up to its name!
reviews.comments: Yes, I love this product.  As an older woman with thinning white hair, this product has made a difference in how my hair looks.  Thick and full!

media.headline: It does what it promises and more!
Liking the volume and texture it gives to my hair
I won't style without it now

faceoff_positive.comments: Been loyal to this product for years, as it truly makes a noticeable difference for volume of hair.  Works for blow-drying and air-drying.  The ONLY thing that annoys me (and it REALLY annoys me) is that BB changes the label every few years, which causes a PANIC because you never know if you're getting the same product, so you actually have to read the old and new ingredient list side-by-side to make sure what you're buying is the same!  It used be called Thickening Spray, THEN Thickening Hairspray, NOW it's called Thickening Spray Pre-Styler.  LEAVE THE NAME OF THE PRODUCT ALONE.  Plus, the new label also now makes it sound like the product is ONLY good for blow-drying.  It's honestly the most pointless and confusing approach to marketing ever.  Other than those marketing errors, the product itself is fabulous.
faceoff_positive.headline: Excellent product, but please stop changing the name!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was amazed at the outstanding reviews and thus ordered the product. The internet ad stated it's key ingredients--however failed to list a type of alcohol in a very high percentage as the main ingredient! That explained why it virtually stripped dry my finely textured very light blonde hair that is in very good condition. The chemical odor was overpowering and it remained on my hair & collar. After a few hours I finally had to remove my garment and launder it to remove the odor. So, this product may truly work for those whose hair is not affected by high doses of drying alcohol and those who are not chemically sensitive, but for me it was a loss of nearly 30 bucks. It didn't add body or thickness as stated. I do wonder if this review will be published.
faceoff_negative.headline: Thickening Hairspray has great reviews...
